{"code":401,"indent":3,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiMake things more difficult by limiting fast travel to only work between places with Fast Travel Points. No more magical retreats!."]}
{"code":401,"indent":3,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiMake the usual means of curing the harsher status much mode difficult to come by."]}
{"code":401,"indent":3,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiYou are going be stuck for a while~ ♫"]}
{"code":401,"indent":3,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiMake it so some items are used instantly in combat, instead of taking a turn."]}
{"code":401,"indent":3,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiWhen you're ambushed by enemies, they will not allow you to escape! You'll be forced to take them on."]}
{"code":401,"indent":3,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiMake all enemies significantly stronger. You better get ready to run when the situation calls for it!"]}
{"code":401,"indent":3,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiGrant access to the Easy Mode cheat room. You'll find its entrance right outside this room, you cheater."]}
{"code":401,"indent":3,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiMake all chests have a chance to be cursed. Will opening them be worth the risk?"]}
{"code":401,"indent":2,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiIn \\C[3]\"Scenario Mode,\" \\C[14]you'll be able to choose from a number of starting scenarios."]}
{"code":401,"indent":2,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiA tiny bit of roleplay to spice things up!"]}
{"code":102,"indent":2,"parameters":[["Yterre's Maid Management","Samona's Puppet Performance","Shandra's Bimbo Bounce","Annie's Cow Capture","No Scenario"],-1,0,2,1]}
{"code":401,"indent":3,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiIn this Scenario, Yterre has taken over Lilina's party and turned them into her devoted maids!"]}
{"code":401,"indent":3,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiIn this Scenario, Lilina's party have fallen victim to Samona's wiles and are now her trusty puppets!"]}
{"code":401,"indent":3,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiIn this Scenario, Lilina's party have gone into debt, and must pay it off working in Rokkas Slut Bar."]}
{"code":401,"indent":3,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiIn this Scenario, Lilina's party have been done in by The Gunslinger, and are now being herded as cattle."]}

{"code":401,"indent":2,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiWith \\C[3]\"Bad Dreams Mode,\" \\C[14]losing in battle and getting a Bad End might have consequences for your party members."]}
{"code":401,"indent":2,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiThey may retain memories of those alternate realities... which is generally not a good thing."]}
{"code":102,"indent":1,"parameters":[["Real Curses Mode","Random Maps Mode","Enemy Takeover Mode","Cursed Equipment Mode","Toggle options...","I'm done!"],-1,-1,2,1]}

{"code":401,"indent":2,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiWith \\C[3]\"Real Curses Mode,\" \\C[14]curses inflicted by enemy attacks or other means have long-lasting consequences for the target."]}

{"code":401,"indent":2,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiWith \\C[3]\"Random Maps Mode,\" \\C[14]some maps will now have an element of randomness to them. Can't have you blazing through on sheer memory alone, now can we?"]}

{"code":401,"indent":2,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiWith \\C[3]\"Enemy Takeover Mode,\" \\C[14]some enemies will target your Leader in an attempt to take over your party! So keep your Leader safe... or don't!"]}

{"code":401,"indent":2,"parameters":["\\C[14]\\lsn<Saint5>\\lspi[150]\\fiWith \\C[3]\"Cursed Equipment Mode,\" \\C[14]you'll never know if the shiny new armor you've gained is actually a cursed item in disguise! Until you decide to equip it, that is."]}
